titleStmt.title: Two petitions presented to the supreame authority of the nation from thousands of the lords, owners, and commoners of Lincolneshire; against the Old Court-Levellers, or propriety-destroyers, the prerogative undertakers.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to John Lilburne.
Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
